disclaimer.text_1: The RSI.im don't store your password and Multi-Factor authentication code.
disclaimer.text_2: This is open source and you can review the code in our GitHub repository. You can visit us at any time by clicking the github link below.
disclaimer.text_3: This is a non-profit 3rd-party service not endorsed by or affiliated with the Cloud Imperium or Roberts Space Industries group of companies.

auth.text_service_description_1: We don't store your password and Multi-Factor authentication code. You can review the source code for this service here
auth.text_service_description_2: This is a non-profit 3rd-party service not endorsed by or affiliated with the Cloud Imperium or Roberts Space Industries group of companies.

sign_in.alert_check_hostname_message: For the safety of your RSI account, be sure to check the web address.
sign_in.link_what_is_this: What is this? Is it safe?

multi_factor.form_code_message: Enter the code sent to your email or from your authenticator. Alternatively use a backup code.

authorize.alert_request_permission_message: { name } would like the ability access following data in your RSI Account.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: The service can be read your unique account number, nickname, display name, avatar, and badges.

joined_organizations.title: Joined organization
joined_organizations.description: The service can collect that organization you join. This data is included organization's name, avatar, and banner information that you join.

owned_games.title: Owned games
owned_games.description: The service can check which games you have. This data is included game's id and name.

launch_game.title: Launch game
launch_game.description: The service may launch game using your account data. This data is included your email, session id, and unique token. Please allow only trusted apps for your account secure.
